name: Imagine: John Lennon
tagline: A biography of the rock music star.

name: Vera Drake
tagline: Abortionist Vera Drake finds her beliefs and practices clash with the mores of 1950s Britain--a conflict that leads to tragedy for her family.

name: The Merchant of Venice
tagline: In 16th century Venice, when a merchant must default on a large loan from an abused Jewish moneylender for a friend with romantic ambitions, the bitterly vengeful creditor demands a gruesome payment instead.

name: Mannequin: On the Move
tagline: A young department store intern falls in love with a female store mannequin who is really a peasant girl fallen under a thousand year spell. She comes to life whenever he removes the cursed necklace from her.

name: Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold
tagline: Allan Quatermain once again teams up with Jesse Huston where the discovery of a mysterious old gold piece sends Quatermain looking for his long-lost brother, missing in the wilds of Africa after seeking a lost white race.

name: The Cold Light of Day
tagline: After his family is kidnapped during their sailing trip in Spain, a young Wall Street trader is confronted by the people responsible: intelligence agents looking to recover a mysterious briefcase.

name: The Gun in Betty Lou's Handbag
tagline: An ignored, small-town librarian confesses to a murder she didn't commit to get attention.

name: The Real Cancun
tagline: Sixteen American college students drink, flirt, fight and canoodle during their Spring Break vacation in Cancun, Mexico.

name: The Secret Lives of Dentists
tagline: An introspective dentist's suspicions about his wife's infidelity stresses his mental well being and family life to the breaking point.

name: The Brother from Another Planet
tagline: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

name: Searching for Sugar Man
tagline: Two South Africans set out to discover what happened to their unlikely musical hero, the mysterious 1970s rock 'n' roller, Rodriguez.

name: Worth Winning
tagline: Taylor is a man who has no problems with women. So confident is he that he accepts a challenge from his friends: he has to secure proposals of marriage from three women of their choice.

name: The Portrait of a Lady
tagline: An American girl inherits a fortune and falls into a misguided relationship with a gentleman confidence artist whose true nature, including a barbed and covetous disposition, turns her life into a nightmare.

name: Pinocchio
tagline: Despite guidance from the Blue Fairy and the love of his father, a wooden puppet's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another.

name: Sunshine
tagline: A team of international astronauts are sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

name: Step Into Liquid
tagline: Surfers and secret spots from around the world are profiled in this documentary.

name: Cabin Boy
tagline: A foul-mouthed finishing school graduate mistakenly winds up on an ill-fated fishing boat, and faces the wrath of a crew that considers him bad luck.

name: Laurel Canyon
tagline: When an uptight young man and his fiancee move into his libertine mother's house, the resulting clash of life attitudes shakes everyone up.

name: Don 2
tagline: An international gangster turns himself in, then dramatically escapes - only to face treachery and betrayal.

name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
tagline: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

name: High Tension
tagline: Two college friends, Marie and Alexa, encounter loads of trouble (and blood) while on vacation at Alexa's parents' country home when a mysterious killer invades their quiet getaway.

name: Caché (Hidden)
tagline: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

name: The Chorus
tagline: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively effect the students' lives through music.

name: Stay
tagline: This movie focuses on the attempts of a psychiatrist to prevent one of his patients from committing suicide while trying to maintain his own grip on reality.

name: Requiem for a Dream
tagline: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions become stronger.

name: My Heroes Have Always Been Cowboys
tagline: A rodeo rider decides to quit his line of work after a serious injury, but when he visits his family and finds out that his dad is not well, he'll have to risk it one more time.

name: Pennies from Heaven
tagline: During the Great Depression, a sheet music salesman seeks to escape his dreary life through popular music and a love affair with an innocent school teacher.

name: Hanky Panky
tagline: The complete innocent, Michael Jordon, is drawn into a web of secrecy and government secrets when a girl carrying a mysterious package gets into a taxi with him. When she is later murdered, Michael is the chief suspect and on the run.

name: Dead Heat
tagline: Two cops are brought back to life to chase down supernatural criminals.

name: Bagdad Cafe
tagline: A lonely German woman ends up in the most desolate motel on Earth and decides to make it brighter.

name: Elegy
tagline: Cultural critic David Kepesh finds his life -- which he indicates is a state of "emancipated manhood" -- thrown into tragic disarray by Consuela Castillo, a well-mannered student who awakens a sense of sexual possessiveness in her teacher.

name: The Jane Austen Book Club
tagline: Six Californians start a club to discuss the works of Jane Austen, only to find their relationships -- both old and new -- begin to resemble 21st century versions of her novels.

name: The Runaways
tagline: A coming-of-age biopic about '70s teenage band The Runaways.

name: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking
Fat Man and Little Boy
tagline: This film reenacts the Manhattan Project, the secret wartime project in New Mexico where the first atomic bombs were designed and built.

name: Cats Don't Dance
tagline: Danny, an ambitious singing/dancing cat, goes to Hollywood and overcomes several obstacles to fulfill his dream of becoming a movie star.

name: Physical Evidence
tagline: A police officer suspended and now accused of murder is forced to join forces with his court-appointed attorney to assemble the pieces of a deadly puzzle to find the missing link before time runs out.

name: Tom and Jerry: The Movie
tagline: The popular cartoon cat and mouse are thrown into a feature film. The story has the twosome trying to help an orphan girl who is being berated and exploited by a greedy guardian.

name: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag
tagline: A mob bagman finds that his luggage, containing the proof of his latest hit, has been switched.

name: Major League: Back to the Minors
Shout
tagline: A new music teacher in a 1955 West Texas home for wayward boys brings new vision and hope for many of the interned boys.

name: Blood and Chocolate
tagline: A young teenage werewolf (Bruckner) is torn between honoring her family's secret and her love for a man (Dancy).

name: Pina
tagline: A tribute to the late German choreographer, Pina Bausch, as her dancers perform her most famous creations.

name: The Brothers Bloom
tagline: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

name: Free Willy 3: The Rescue
tagline: A teenage Jesse and old friend Randolph try to foil an illegal whaler threatening Willy and his pregnant mate.

name: The Good Thief
tagline: An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.

name: The Pest
tagline: A Miami con man agrees to be the human target for a Neo-Nazi manhunter, in order to collect $50,000 if he survives.

name: Feast of Love
tagline: A meditation on love and its various incarnations, set within a community of friends in Oregon. and is described as an exploration of the magical, mysterious and sometimes painful incarnations of love.

name: The Wraith
tagline: Jamie, killed by neighborhood thugs, returns as a mystical figure named Jake (The Wraith) to gain revenge.

name: Casanova's Big Night
tagline: A meek tailor thinks his wooing will be helped if he assumes the identity of the famous Casanova...who's deeply in debt.

name: Fistful of Dollars
tagline: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

name: Happy-Go-Lucky
tagline: A look at a few chapters in the life of Poppy, a cheery, colorful, North London schoolteacher whose optimism tends to exasperate those around her.

name: 'Til There Was You
tagline: Two strangers, whose paths are always crossing, finally meet when fate steps in.

name: The Lemon Sisters
tagline: Three life-long friends work the bars in 1980's Atlantic City performing the songs of the 60's girl groups in this self-indulgent comedy.

name: Talk Radio
tagline: A rude, contemptuous talk show host becomes overwhelmed by the hatred that surrounds his program just before it goes national.

name: The To Do List
tagline: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.

name: Jodhaa Akbar
tagline: A sixteenth century love story about a marriage of alliance that gave birth to true love between a great Mughal emperor, Akbar, and a Rajput princess, Jodha.

name: The Barbarian Invasions
tagline: During his final days, a dying man is reunited with old friends, former lovers, his ex-wife, and his estranged son.

name: Malèna
tagline: A woman provokes sensual awakenings in a group of adolescent boys.

name: A Simple Twist of Fate
tagline: His life was emotionally closed off from the world, until an orphaned baby showed up at his house.

name: Om Shanti Om

production.name: Films & Casting Temple Pvt. Ltd. Sydney

tagline: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

name: Metallica Through the Never
tagline: Trip, a young roadie for Metallica, is sent on an urgent mission during the band's show. But what seems like a simple assignment turns into a surreal adventure.

name: Father Hood
tagline: A deadbeat dad kidnaps his kids from the bus. Based on the true life stories and experiences of Michael J. Hardy.

name: Kinjite: Forbidden Subjects
tagline: A brutal Los Angeles police Lt. is determined to bust up an organization that forces underage girls into prostitution.

name: Born Into Brothels: Calcutta's Red Light Kids
tagline: Two documentary filmmakers chronicle their time in Sonagchi, Calcutta and the relationships they developed with children of prostitutes who work the city's notorious red light district.

name: In the Good Old Summertime
tagline: Musical remake of 1940 "Shop Around the Corner" by Lubitch.

name: Like Crazy
tagline: A British college student falls for an American student, only to be separated from him when she's banned from the U.S. after overstaying her visa.

name: Next Stop Wonderland
tagline: An unlucky in love nurse finds her life taking a detour when her mother places a personals ad in the paper, while on the other side of Boston, a plumber is trying to change careers.

name: Nitro Circus: The Movie
tagline: Travis Pastrana and his tight-knit, highly-skilled, adrenaline-addicted friends bring their impossible, ridiculous, insane and hysterical adventures to the big screen for the first time.

name: Once Upon a Time... When We Were Colored
tagline: A narrator tells the story of his childhood years in a tightly knit Afro-American community in the deep south under racial segregation.

name: Near Dark
tagline: A young man reluctantly joins a travelling "family" of evil vampires, when the girl he'd tried to seduce is part of that group.

name: Emperor
tagline: As the Japanese surrender at the end of WWII, Gen. Fellers is tasked with deciding if Emperor Hirohito will be hanged as a war criminal. Influencing his ruling is his quest to find Aya, an exchange student he met years earlier in the U.S.
